title: U.S. price difference between legal and illegal cannabis as of January 2016 , by state
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average price per ounce in USD on the Y-axis for 6 different States for 2 groups Dispensary price, and Street price that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Dispensary price had the highest Average price per ounce in USD in State Michigan and Street price had the lowest Average price per ounce in USD in State Oregon.
Among all the States, Dispensary price had the highest Average price per ounce in USD 301.0 in State Michigan and lowest value 214.0 in State Oregon.
The maximum Average price per ounce in USD for Dispensary price that was found in State Michigan was 1.41 times larger than the minimum Average price per ounce in USD observed in State Oregon.
yAxis: Average price per ounce in USD
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average price per ounce in USD on the Y-axis for 6 different States for 2 groups Dispensary price, and Street price that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Dispensary price had the highest Average price per ounce in USD in State Michigan and Street price had the lowest Average price per ounce in USD in State Oregon.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average price per ounce in USD on the Y-axis for 6 different States for 2 groups Dispensary price, and Street price that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Dispensary price had the highest Average price per ounce in USD in State Michigan and Street price had the lowest Average price per ounce in USD in State Oregon.
Among all the States, Dispensary price had the highest Average price per ounce in USD 301.0 in State Michigan and lowest value 214.0 in State Oregon.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different States on X-axis for 2 groups Dispensary price, and Street price. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average price per ounce in USD.
Out of all 2 groups, Dispensary price had the highest Average price per ounce in USD in State Michigan and Street price had the lowest Average price per ounce in USD in State Oregon.
In State Michigan, Dispensary price had the maximum Average price per ounce in USD and it saw the lowest in State Oregon out of all 6 States.
There is a gap of 87.0 between the highest and lowest Average price per ounce in USD found for Dispensary price in State Michigan and Oregon.

Among the groups, Dispensary price had the biggest difference in Average price per ounce in USD. Where the maximum Average price per ounce in USD was 1.41 times larger than the minimum Average price per ounce in USD.
Averaging all 2 groups Dispensary price, and Street price, the State Michigan is the maximum Average price per ounce in USD and Oregon is the minimum Average price per ounce in USD.
